name: Crappy Birds!
description:
Imagine a world where it's socially acceptable to crap on people... Well now it's here. Crappy Birds! is a new game where you can tap to crap. You will have 20 seconds to crap on as many people, objects or whatever as you can.

When you go to start a new game it will load the profile pictures of 8 random Facebook friends who have authorised the Crappy Birds! app, you can then choose to continue or click on a target to add from the photo library or take a picture.

Want to get even crappier? Well there are boosts that will allow you to have up to 5 craps on screen at a time or get an extra 10 seconds.

You can even share your final score on Facebook to let people know how many times you crapped on them. Crap on them before they can crap on you...

Let's get crappin'!
